txt.en: Lurking beneath the surface of the reflective red pools of Agamaur are fell spirits from ancient times. These spirits manifest in the form of darkwater. These terrifying spirits lay waste to all living things that they happen upon and are servants, not only of Angmar, but also the darker forces of the world.
Terrifying foes of ancient times, the darkwater use water to form themselves into horrible creatures of darkness. They do not suffer the living and must be destroyed wherever they are found.
